attributes.action: Give gay couples the same rights to fertility treatment as heterosexual couples
attributes.additional_details: Lesbian couples have to spend on average £12,000 just to qualify for IVF. As stated on the NHS website - “12 cycles of artificial insemination, with at least 6 of these cycles using a method called intrauterine.”
attributes.background: Currently the guidelines state that IVF should be offered to women under the age of 43 who have been trying to get pregnant through regular unprotected sex for 2 years. This discriminates against same sex couples.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599727
